Click to reset the contents of this page to what it was after the last save...
Click to open a new or activate an existing window containing the 'Interact Xpress Shell'.
Click to send (upload) a project from your computer to the PAC.
Click to get a copy of the project from the PAC to your computer.
Click to indicate the current project should be deleted from the PAC once the 'Save' button is clicked.
This page is used for managing the Xpress HMI.
When checked, indicates that the PAC should automatically generate the PLC tags.
Contains data related to the current Xpress HMI Project.
The full path and name of the Xpress HMI Project file to send (upload) to the PAC.
The name of the current Xpress Project.
The version of the current Xpress Project.

Messages.Message: 'Project Name' must be at least 3 characters in length.
'Project Version' must contain at least one digit.
'Project sub-Version' must contain at least one digit.
